quote: We don't have all the answers. A few months ago, that would have driven me crazy. Now I know sometimes you have to just take life for what it is instead of worrying about what might happen.
quote_letters: WE DONT HAVE ALL THE ANSWERS A FEW MONTHS AGO THAT WOULD HAVE DRIVEN ME CRAZY NOW I KNOW SOMETIMES YOU HAVE TO JUST TAKE LIFE FOR WHAT IT IS INSTEAD OF WORRYING ABOUT WHAT MIGHT HAPPEN
